con:request.name: RetrieveFareQuote
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrieveFareQuote> xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">FareClassFareBasis</rad:FareGroupMethod> <rad:InventoryFilterMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">Available</rad:InventoryFilterMethod> <rad:FareQuoteDetails xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"> <rad:FareQuoteDetail> <rad:Origin>${#TestSuite#Origin}</rad:Origin> <rad:Destination>${#TestSuite#Destination}</rad:Destination> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo> <rad:DateOfDeparture>${#TestSuite#DepartureDate}</rad:DateOfDeparture> <rad:FareTypeCategory>1</rad:FareTypeCategory> <rad:FareClass xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareBasisCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:Cabin xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:LFID>0</rad:LFID> <rad:OperatingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:MarketingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:NumberOfDaysBefore>0</rad:NumberOfDaysBefore> <rad:NumberOfDaysAfter>0</rad:NumberOfDaysAfter> <rad:LanguageCode>en</rad:LanguageCode> <rad:TicketPackageID xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfos> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:PassengerTypeID>6</rad:PassengerTypeID><rad:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad:TotalSeatsRequired></rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:PassengerTypeID>5</rad:PassengerTypeID><rad:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad:TotalSeatsRequired></rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo> <rad:LogicalFlightKey xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </rad:FareQuoteDetail> </rad:FareQuoteDetails> <rad:ProfileId xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">0</rad:ProfileId> </tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> </tem:RetrieveFareQuote> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AssessPaymentMethod
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Fees.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> <!--Optional:--> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#TestSuite#carriercode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>${empty}</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>${empty}</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> <rad1:PaymentMethod>${#TestSuite#PaymentMethod}</rad1:PaymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:PaymentMethodType>${empty}</rad1:PaymentMethodType> <rad1:CardNumber>${empty}</rad1:CardNumber> <rad1:PaymentAmount>${#TestCase#Balance}</rad1:PaymentAmount> </rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> </rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
